creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: five lines of calligraphy written on decorated paper; light greyish-green image of a crane standing on pine branch in background; branch extends up L side of paper towards top; oval intaglio stamp URC; square relief stamp LLC
markings: URC, oval intaglio; LLC square relief; on back, top center, in pencil: [Hansui]
title: Poem
